00034 #define CURRENT_SUMMATION_DELIVERED_ATTRIBUTE_ID     CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00035 #define METER_STATUS_ATTRIBUTE_ID                    CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0200)
00036 #define UNIT_OF_MEASURE_ATTRIBUTE_ID                 CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0300)
00037 #define SUMMATION_FORMATING_ATTRIBUTE_ID             CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0303)
00038 #define METERING_DEVICE_TYPE_ATTRIBUTE_ID            CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0306)

00045   #define GENERIC_ALARM_MASK_ATTRIBUTE_ID            CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0800)

00047   #define MANUFACTURE_ALARM_MASK_ATTRIBUTE_ID        CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0806)
00048   #define BILL_TO_DATE_ATTRIBUTE_ID                  CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0A00)
00049   #define BILL_TO_DATE_TIME_STAMP_ATTRIBUTE_ID       CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0A01)
00050   #define PROJECTED_BILL_ATTRIBUTE_ID                CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0A02)
00051   #define PROJECTED_BILL_TIME_STAMP_ATTRIBUTE_ID     CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0A03)
00052

00215 #define SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00216   { \
00217     .id = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ID, \
00218     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00219     .attributesAmount = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00220     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00221     .commandsAmount = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00222     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00223   }
00224 
00225 #define SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00226   { \
00227     .id = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ID, \
00228     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00229     .attributesAmount = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00230     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00231     .commandsAmount = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00232     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00233   }
00234 
00235 #define DEFINE_SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00236 
00237 #define SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00238   { \
00239     .id = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ID, \
00240     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00241     .attributesAmount = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00242     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00243     .commandsAmount = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00244     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00245   }
00246 
00247 #define SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00248   { \
00249     .id = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ID, \
00250     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \

00252     .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00253     .commandsAmount = SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00254     .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00255   }
00256 #define DEFINE_SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_FLASH(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_##cltype##_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)

00258 BEGIN_PACK

00260 /*************************************************************************/
00265 typedef struct PACK
00266 {
00269   struct PACK
00270   {
00271     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;                         
00272     uint8_t           type;                       
00273     uint8_t           properties;                 
00274     uint8_t           value[6];                   
00275     ZCL_ReportTime_t  reportCounter;              
00276     ZCL_ReportTime_t  minReportInterval;          
00277     ZCL_ReportTime_t  maxReportInterval;          
00278     uint8_t           reportableChange[6];        
00279     ZCL_ReportTime_t  timeoutPeriod;              
00280     uint8_t           lastReportedValue[6];       
00281   } currentSummationDelivered;
00282 
00285   struct PACK
00286   {
00287     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;                         
00288     uint8_t           type;                       
00289     uint8_t           properties;                 
00290 
00291     struct PACK
00292     {
00293       LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(8,(
00294         uint8_t         checkMeter            :1, 
00295         uint8_t         lowBattery            :1, 
00296         uint8_t         tamperDetect          :1, 
00297         uint8_t         powerFailure          :1, 
00298         uint8_t         powerQuality          :1, 
00299         uint8_t         leakDetect            :1, 
00300         uint8_t         serviceDisconnectOpen :1, 
00301         uint8_t         reserved              :1  
00302       ))
00303     } value;
00304   } meterStatus;
00305 
00306 #ifdef __UK_MARKET_EXT__
00307 
00308   struct PACK
00309   {
00310     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;                         
00311     uint8_t           type;                       
00312     uint8_t           properties;                 
00313     struct PACK                                   
00314     {
00315       struct PACK
00316       {
00317         LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(8,(
00318           uint8_t        meterCoverRemoved           :1, 
00319           uint8_t        strongMagneticFieldDetected :1, 
00320           uint8_t        batteryFailure              :1, 
00321           uint8_t        programMemoryError          :1, 
00322           uint8_t        ramError                    :1, 
00323           uint8_t        nvMemoryError               :1, 
00324           uint8_t        measurementSystemError      :1, 
00325           uint8_t        watchdogError               :1  
00326         ))
00327         LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(7,(
00328           uint8_t        supplyDisconnectFailure     :1, 
00329           uint8_t        supplyConnectFailure        :1, 
00330           uint8_t        measurementSWChanged        :1, 
00331           uint8_t        dayLightSavingEnabled       :1, 
00332           uint8_t        clockInvalid                :1, 
00333           uint8_t        communicationsTamper        :1, 
00334           uint8_t        reservedTo16                :2  
00335         ))
00336         uint8_t          reservedTo24;                   
00337       } generalFlags;
00338       union
00339       {
00340         struct PACK
00341         {
00342           LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(5,(
00343             uint8_t        batteryCoverRemoved       :1, 
00344             uint8_t        tiltTamper                :1, 
00345             uint8_t        excessFlow                :1, 
00346             uint8_t        reverseFlow               :1, 
00347             uint8_t        reservedTo32              :4  
00348           ))
00349         uint8_t            reservedTo40;                 
00350         } gasMeterFlags;
00351 
00352         struct PACK
00353         {
00354           LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(7,(
00355             uint8_t        terminalCoverRemoved      :1, 
00356             uint8_t        incorrectPolarity         :1, 
00357             uint8_t        currentWithNovoltage      :1, 
00358             uint8_t        limitThresholdExceeded    :1, 
00359             uint8_t        underVoltage              :1, 
00360             uint8_t        overVoltage               :1, 
00361             uint8_t        reservedTo32              :1  
00362           ))
00363           uint8_t          reservedTo40;                 
00364         } electricityMeterFlags;
00365       };
00366       struct PACK
00367       {
00368         LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(8,(
00369           uint8_t            FlagA                   :1, 
00370           uint8_t            FlagB                   :1, 
00371           uint8_t            FlagC                   :1, 
00372           uint8_t            FlagD                   :1, 
00373           uint8_t            FlagE                   :1, 
00374           uint8_t            FlagF                   :1, 
00375           uint8_t            FlagG                   :1, 
00376           uint8_t            FlagH                   :1  
00377         ))
00378       } manufacturerFlags;
00379     } value;
00380   } extendedStatus;
00381 #endif /* __UK_MARKET_EXT__ */
00382 
00385   struct PACK
00386   {
00387     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;                         
00388     uint8_t           type;                       
00389     uint8_t           properties;                 
00390     uint8_t           value;                      
00391   } unitofMeasure;
00392 
00393 
00395   struct PACK
00396   {
00397     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;                         
00398     uint8_t           type;                       
00399     uint8_t           properties;                 
00400 
00406     struct PACK
00407     {
00408       LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(3,(
